notes_display: Medal commemorates capture of Porto Bello.  Has one planchet crack; runs through top of obverse and bottom of reverse.  The top of the piece (when looking at the obverse) is slightly bent.
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Full length figure of Vernon Standing at left, faces right.  He holds a sword in his right hand, and with his left he receives the sword of Don Blass, who is shown at right, facing Vernon in a kneeling position.
issue_obverse_legend_s: THE . SPANISH . PRIDE . PULLD . DOWN . BY . ADMIRAL . VERNON . | DON | BLASS
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Six ships depicted representing the capture of Porto Bello.
issue_reverse_legend_s: WHO . TOOK . PORTO . BELLO . WITH . SIX . SHIPS . ONLV [sic] | NOV . 22 . 1739 .
